description:
In this course ' Learn 20 Powerful Hypnotic Words For Influence And Persuasion Using Conversational Hypnosis ' by Pradeep Aggarwal you will learn 20 powerful words that can be used in your daily life to influence people, persuade people , motivate, inspire , heal and convince them etc . These words are used by some of us unconsciously and by using the words consciously in your daily life you can achieve more success in your life .

These words can be used by stage performers and speakers as well and is beneficial to the sales people as it will help them persuade their potential buyers .

The course contains 11 lectures and around 30 minutes of video content live recorded by Pradeep Aggarwal

This course includes -

Introduction

The first 5 powerful words - The ' LY ' words

How to use the 5 powerful words in combination with other words

The 3 most powerful words- Awareness category words

Examples of awareness words and their usage

The 3 powerful words - Time number category words

The 3 powerful words- Special category words

The powerful cause and effect words

Example of the powerful words and their usage

The last 2 most powerful words

Summary of the course
title: Learn 20 Powerful Hypnotic Words For Influence & Persuasion
